vscode-lxd.configuration.title: LXD
vscode-lxd.configuration.properties.daem: Path of unix domain socket, which is used for querying the LXD daemon.
vscode-lxd.configuration.properties.supp: Do not show warnings that the environment is not supported.
vscode-lxd.configuration.properties.refr: The time interval, in seconds, at which the data or view should be automatically refreshed.
vscode-lxd.commands.reportIssue: Report an issue with the LXD extension...
